title: Boko Haram Kidnaps 500 Children In Northeastern Nigeria
teaser: Boko Haram militants have kidnapped more than 500 women and children from the northeastern Nigerian town of Damasak, reports say. The kidnappings come as regional forces were helping Nigeria push militants out of Damasak. Scores of villagers were killed in the violence.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
